venue.name: Piscassic Street Boat Launch Conservation/Recreation Area

item.description:
Date: Wednesday August 20, 2008
Time: 6:00 pm - 8:00 pm
Location: Newmarket, NH

Open to all kayak types as well as canoes

Directions: Take Route 108 into Newmarket and turn onto Elm St, which is the street with the Newmarket Library on it.

Take Elm about a half mile up & over a hill to Beech St.

Turn right onto Beech & then right again at the end of Beech, on to Salmon Street.

Salmon curves past several apt. complexes.

Turn right onto Piscassic St at the Twin Rivers complex. The launch is at the end of the street.

Life vests must be worn when paddling with this group.

Google Directions/Map link below
Piscassic St. Newmarket, NH
item.how_to_find_us: Boat Launch is at the end of Piscassic St.
item.name: NE Seacoast Paddlers Piscassic River Newmarket, NH Paddle
